attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Horrible app. takes forever to download and doesn’t even work at all. Very useless and does not even help. I don’t like it.

attributes.title: BAD
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i support trump but this app is just terrible it took days to download and i was using mcdonald internet it’s a boring app and overall not worth it DO NOT DOWNLOAD💕🧚🏽‍♀️💘💝💖💞🧚🏼‍♂️✨

attributes.title: Worst app in human history and beyond
attributes.review: This app never even loaded all the way I was unable to do anything!!! Do Not Get This App I REALLY REALLY hope it gets taken down very soon ❤️🧚🏼

attributes.title: Terrible app, terrible president
attributes.review: This app is glitchy, and overall has an awkward setup. I don’t know what i expected though, considering the atrocious job trumps doing in the office.

attributes.title: Bad 👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👺👺👺🤬🤬😡
attributes.review: Very bad. No good. Delete. Ugly. Eats ants. Smells bad. A virus. I downloaded this app and my wife left me. My whole family left me. Not cool. Garfield go is a much better app and deserves the downloads. This is stinky. Delete this. It look ugly. 👎

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is so laggy it’s not even funny. I constantly lag out of the app and it keeps kicking me out. Please fix the glitch. Thank you.

attributes.title: Caused my eye to pop out of its socket
attributes.review: I was looking at the app and then all of the sudden my eye fell out I freaked out and when I deleted the app it went back in so the app is cursed

attributes.title: phone glitch 😤
attributes.review: right at the start my phone started to glitch and asked if i wanted to keep america great?? idk very bad choice of words in my opinion. and then they chose to have this orange man holding a fist? yeah i don’t know what that’s all about, he should fix his hair. just a thought overall bad app and should get deleted from the app store.

attributes.title: This app tries to steal your info
attributes.review: It asked for access to my web browser and settings

attributes.title: Disgusting 🙄
attributes.review: This app is a DISGUSTING DISGRACE because I can NOT find a at least one reason why I should vote for Donald Trump!!!!!😤 I also got a terrible virus on my phone for downloading the app trying to educate myself!!!😟 I stand TRUMP FOR 0 MORE YEARS!!!!!!!!!! 🥳
